participant_1.background:
I enjoy spending time with my daughters and taking pictures of them.
I love spending time with my friends, whether it's going out to dinner, seeing a movie, or just hanging out at home.
I went scuba diving with my wife and friends to celebrate my birthday.
I enjoy playing with my parakeet and going for walks to help keep me active.
i am currently pregnant with my second child.

participant_2.background:
Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab.
i want to visit the uk.
I spent a lot of time last year listening to The Muggers and trying to produce music myself.
I spent time with my family and friends.
i do not like broccoli.

content.text: Hi there! I'm participant_1, how are you?
Hello! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. What about you?
I'm good too, thanks! I'm from Toronto, how about you?
I'm also from Toronto! I love this city, but the summers can be a bit much.
I know what you mean! It can get pretty hot and humid. Do you have any plans for the summer?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going to the beach with my friends. What about you?
I'm not sure yet either, but I'm hoping to go on vacation with my family.
That sounds like fun! Where are you thinking of going?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going to the UK. I've always wanted to go there.
That would be amazing! I've heard that the UK is beautiful.
I'm sure it is! I've been listening to a lot of The Muggers lately, and they're from the UK.
Oh, I love The Muggers! I saw them live a few years ago. They were great!
That's awesome! I'm jealous! I've always wanted to see them live.
They're really good live! I hope you get to see them someday.
Thanks! I hope so too.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, play with my parakeet, and go for walks.
That sounds like fun! I like to do a lot of the same things. I also like to listen to music and produce music.
That's awesome! I love music too. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to indie rock and electronic music.
I love indie rock too! I don't listen to a lot of electronic music, but I like some of it.
That's cool! I'm glad we have some similar interests.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
Definitely! I'm glad we met.
Me too
